welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rhyl, a charming seaside town known for its beautiful beaches and lively atmosphere. We hope you enjoy your stay and discover all the hidden gems this city has to offer. Have a wonderful time exploring the sights and sounds of Rhyl!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport caters to seasonal flights and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
